titles.title: To extend and modify the temporary suspension of duty on ADTP.
To extend and modify the temporary suspension of duty on ADTP.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to provide a duty, through December 31, 2011, on 2-Amino-5,8-dimethoxy-(1,2,4)trizolo(1,5-c)pyrimidine (ADTP).
